Exaggerate: The claim suggests that Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez exaggerated the danger she was in during the Capitol riot.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Ocasio-Cortez was not in the main Capitol building where the House and Senate Chambers are located.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to prove that Ocasio-Cortez exaggerated the danger she was in.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that being in the main Capitol building is the only way to be in danger during the riot.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim ignores the alternative explanation that Ocasio-Cortez was in her congressional office, which was one of the two buildings that were evacuated during the riot.
